q: SELECT i/${path} FROM EHR e[ehr_id/value='${ehr_id}'] CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.test_all_types.v1] CONTAINS SECTION s[openEHR-EHR-SECTION.test_all_types.v1] CONTAINS INSTRUCTION i[openEHR-EHR-INSTRUCTION.test_all_types.v1] WHERE (c/uid/value = '${c_uid}' AND i/language/terminology_id/value = 'ISO_639-1')
